name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Elements [post icons]
description:
Tumblr 'new post' icons, for your dashboard.

"Water, Earth, Fire, Air, Fan, Sword, and BOOMERANG! All the elements from Avatar the Last Airbender as your post icons on Tumblr. Might get confusing but hey! It looks good right? haha"
 -- MasterArrowhead
